name: rainbow-js
description: The Arc programming language, reimplemented in Java, then ported to JavaScript.

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run build-custom && npm run build-closure
scripts.build-closure: mkdir -p dist/gh-pages/test/ && google-closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js src/web/index-first.js --js src/rainbow.js --js src/web/index-last.js --js_output_file dist/gh-pages/test/index-min.js
